title: SGA's MVP performance lifts OKC to Game 2 win
content: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander scored 34 points in a decisive Game 2 victory, bringing his total over his first two Finals games to an NBA-record 72 points.

title: Judge homers off Red Sox rookie after jab at Yanks
content: Aaron Judge hit one of his two home runs Sunday night off Red Sox rookie Hunter Dobbins, whose recent comment that he'd rather retire than play for New York made waves. As Judge said, "I've only heard Ken Griffey say that, so I was a little surprised."

title: Source: Packers to release star CB Alexander
content: The Packers plan to release two-time Pro Bowl cornerback Jaire Alexander, a source told ESPN, after the sides couldn't come to an agreement on a revised contract.

title: Alcaraz rallies in French thriller: 'Just believed'
content: Carlos Alcaraz came back from two sets down and saved three match points to beat Jannik Sinner on Sunday and retain the French Open title.

title: Sources: RB Chubb expected to sign with Texans
content: Four-time Pro Bowl running back Nick Chubb is expected to sign a one-year deal with the Texans on Monday, sources told ESPN.

title: Sky's Vandersloot out for season with ACL tear
content: Veteran Sky point guard Courtney Vandersloot will miss the rest of the 2025 season after tearing her right ACL, the team announced Sunday.

title: Rays' Franco charged with gun possession in D.R.
content: Rays shortstop Wander Franco, who's on trial on charges that include sexual abuse of a minor, was charged Sunday with illegal possession of a handgun.

title: Tearful Ronaldo says 'duty done' after 2nd NL win
content: Portugal skipper Cristiano Ronaldo shed tears of joy as they won their second Nations League title on Sunday, insisting that winning trophies with his country beats all club honors.

title: Who might skip mandatory minicamp? Micah Parsons, Kirk Cousins among players to watch
content: Several key players, such as Haason Reddick and TJ Watt, missed OTAs, but this week's camp isn't voluntary. Will they show?

title: Full AL, NL projections and biggest debates
content: Freddie Freeman vs. Pete Alonso? Tarik Skubal vs. Kris Bubic? Here's our one-month-out look at who will make it to Atlanta.

title: 2025 NBA Finals: NBA experts debate Thunder-Pacers Game 3 storylines, what's next
content: The Thunder evened the series on Sunday with a win over the Pacers. Here's what to watch heading into Game 3.

title: Inside the numbers: Where Connor McDavid, Leon Draisaitl rank as an all-time playoff duo
content: Edmonton's superstars are climbing the record books this postseason, passing legends on a near-nightly basis.

title: The Big Two? This Alcaraz-Sinner rivalry is epic
content: Sinner and Alcaraz have combined to win the last six Grand Slams -- and are pushing each other to new heights in the sport.

title: Dan Mullen wants to win in style at UNLV
content: After spending a few years on TV, the coach is back at the helm of a college program and looking to make a statement.

title: NCAA athlete pay: Here's what's next
content: Schools will begin directly paying their athletes in less than a month, thanks to a legal settlement that was officially approved in federal court Friday. However, the situation is far from settled.

title: Who won the men's transfer portal? Let's rank the 13 best teams
content: These teams got the best players from the transfer portal -- with some familiar faces in the mix for top spot.

title: UFC 316 clears the way for much-anticipated bantamweight showdowns
content: Two blockbuster fights seem imminent for the UFC 316 main card winners, while next steps for the losers are murkier.

title: Transfer trends: Portugal-to-Prem pipeline, Italy is Europe's retirement home
content: Diving into 2,000 transfers, ESPN's Bill Connelly identifies the good, the bad and the ugly market trends since 2015.

title: Portugal's impressive Nations League win over Spain outshines Ronaldo vs. Yamal
content: Portugal's collective quality won the day -- and the headlines -- over Spain's impressive young talent.

title: Ronaldo to stay at Al Nassr? 'Nothing will change'
content: Cristiano Ronaldo has ended speculation regarding his future by confirming he will remain at Al Nassr.

title: Spectator dies at Nations League final after fall
content: UEFA has confirmed the death of a spectator during Portugal's Nations League final win against Spain in Munich on Sunday.

title: Sources: Chelsea eye Gittens deal, 1st bid rejected
content: Chelsea are continuing to pursue a deal for Jamie Gittens despite Borussia Dortmund holding out for a fee in the region of £40 million ($54.3m), sources have told ESPN.

title: Alonso starts work as Madrid step up CWC prep
content: Xabi Alonso completed his first training session as manager of Real Madrid on Monday after being reminded by Florentino Perez of the importance of the Club World Cup.

title: Tuchel says he won't 'sugarcoat' England criticism
content: Thomas Tuchel has warned his England squad he won't "sugarcoat" his assessment of performances after criticising aspects of the win over Andorra.

title: MLS, players still at odds on CWC compensation
content: The discussions between MLS and the MLS Players Association over the Club World Cup prize money and player compensation remain ongoing, with the two sides failing to agree so far on terms in a newly revised section of the CBA.

title: Trailblazing Prem ref Uriah Rennie dies aged 65
content: Uriah Rennie, the first Black referee in the Premier League, has died aged 65, the Sheffield and Hallamshire County Football Association said on Sunday.

title: Jennifer Kupcho ends nearly three-year LPGA winless drought
content: Jennifer Kupcho closed with an 8-foot birdie putt in light rain to hold off Ilhee Lee on Sunday in the ShopRite LPGA Classic, ending a drought of nearly three years without winning.

title: Joaquin Niemann takes LIV Golf Virginia for fourth win in 2025
content: Joaquin Niemann of Chile won LIV Golf Virginia on Sunday for his fourth victory in the Saudi-funded tour's first eight events of the season.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Arsenal plan fresh talks over €100m Sesko deal
content: Arsenal have scheduled another round of talks over signing RB Leipzig striker Benjamin Sesko. Transfer Talk has the latest news, gossip and rumors.

title: Meghalaya murder case: Autopsy report reveals how Raja Raghuvanshi was killed
content: Raja Raghuvanshi was murdered during his honeymoon in Meghalaya, with the autopsy revealing he died from sharp weapon injuries. His wife, Sonam, and three accomplices have been arrested after confessing to a murder-for-hire plot. The investigation is ongoing, with police recovering a machete and pursuing further leads in the case.

title: No return tickets, sudden plan change: Kin of murdered honeymooner share shocking details
content: The murder of Indore businessman Raja Raghuvanshi in Meghalaya has taken a shocking turn as his mother reveals he was hesitant about the honeymoon. Sonam, his wife, planned the trip but didn't book return tickets, raising suspicions. The family suspects Sonam and her alleged lover, Raj Kushwaha, were involved, especially after Sonam's sudden surrender and the discovery that Raja was carrying valuable jewelry.

title: 11 years of PM Modi: BJP chief hails shift from ‘politics of appeasement’ to 'performance'
content: BJP President JP Nadda asserted that Prime Minister Narendra Modi's 11 years in power have transformed Indian politics, shifting the focus from appeasement to performance and accountability. He highlighted the government's inclusive development approach, outreach to marginalized communities, and bold decisions like abolishing Triple Talaq. Nadda also emphasized India's economic progress and proactive governance during crises like the COVID-19 pandemic.

title: Honeymoon horror: Meghalaya Police takes custody of Sonam Raghuvanshi in UP
content: Sonam Raghuvanshi, accused of plotting her husband's murder during their honeymoon, has been taken into custody by Meghalaya police from Uttar Pradesh. Three individuals have already been arrested, confessing to being hired by Sonam to kill Raja. The autopsy revealed Raja died from injuries inflicted by a sharp weapon, with a machete recovered nearby.

title: 'Stabbed her 13 times': B'luru techie kills lover, mother of 2 at hotel; arrested
content: In Bengaluru, Harini R, a 33-year-old woman, was found murdered in a hotel room. Police have arrested Yashas, 25, her alleged lover, in connection with the crime. Harini, married with two children, had been in an extramarital affair with Yashas. The murder occurred after Harini told Yashas she could no longer continue the relationship.

title: Steve Jobs tip to Apple CEO Tim Cook: Never to stay 'married' to my past ...; a skill Cook says he learnt late
content: Tim Cook credits Steve Jobs with teaching him the invaluable skill of rapidly changing his mind when presented with new evidence, a trait powered by emotional intelligence. Jobs's ability to shift direction and let go of pride influenced Cook and many others, including Jeff Bezos, Jony Ive, and Marc Benioff.

title: ITR filing: Got a notice? Top types of tax notices & actions required
content: As the ITR filing season for FY 2024-25 begins, understanding potential Income Tax Department notices is crucial. Ignoring deadlines or inaccuracies in 26AS & AIS can lead to penalties. Prompt action, accurate documentation, and expert consultation when needed are essential for a stress-free compliance.

title: Honeymoon murder twist: 'Sonam suddenly surfaced', say cops; reveal details of arrested 'hitmen'
content: Meghalaya Police clarified that Sonam Raghuvanshi voluntarily surrendered at Nandganj Police Station in Ghazipur, Uttar Pradesh, in connection with the honeymoon murder case. She is currently under the safe custody of the Uttar Pradesh Police, and legal procedures are being followed for her transit and formal statement, as confirmed by Deputy CM Prestone Tynsong.

title: Google AI CEO: 'Supersmart AI won't kill all jobs; Will help us reach stars in…'
content: Google DeepMind CEO, Demis Hassabis, forecasts a bright future with Artificial General Intelligence. He believes AGI will spark a golden age for humanity. This includes galactic colonisation within five years. Hassabis dismisses fears of job losses. He says AI will create new, better jobs. AI will enhance human productivity, especially in healthcare. Human empathy will remain crucial in many roles.

title: LA riots: Newsom blames Trump admin for inciting violence
content: California Governor Gavin Newsom has condemned the Trump administration's deployment of 2,000 National Guard troops to Los Angeles, accusing them of escalating tensions amid immigration protests. Newsom asserts that Trump is manufacturing a crisis, while the administration claims local authorities have lost control.

title: Honeymoon horror: 'Wife hired killers', say cops; 'Sonam innocent,' claims family
content: Sonam Raghuvanshi's father claims her innocence after she was arrested for allegedly hiring people to kill her husband during their honeymoon in Meghalaya. He accuses the Meghalaya Police of fabricating the story and plans to request a CBI inquiry.

title: Honeymoon horror: Sonam's brother reveals what he did after her phone call
content: Sonam Raghuvanshi faced arrest in connection with her husband's murder. The arrest occurred on the Varanasi-Ghazipur highway. She allegedly planned the crime during their honeymoon in Meghalaya. Three men were also arrested. They confessed to being hired by Sonam. Raja's body was discovered in a gorge. The family insists on Sonam's innocence.

title: Tesla Optimus chief resigns: Thanks Elon Musk in his farewell post on Twitter; says ‘You have …'
content: Milan Kovac, Tesla's Optimus robot project head, has resigned to spend more time with family abroad after nine years with the company. This transition occurs as Tesla intensifies its focus on autonomous technology and robotics. Ashok Elluswamy, currently leading Tesla’s Autopilot team, will assume Kovac’s responsibilities amidst challenges like rare-earth magnet export restrictions.

title: Watch: Handcuffed Indian student in US pinned to ground, deported
content: A video showing an Indian student being handcuffed and deported from Newark Airport in the US has sparked outrage. Social entrepreneur Kunal Jain witnessed the incident, where the student was treated like a criminal and appeared disoriented. Jain is seeking assistance from the Indian Embassy and External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar, highlighting concerns about the increasing number of similar deportations.

title: 'Good first step': Rahul on EC move to release Maha rolls; seeks 'exact date'
content: Rahul Gandhi has urged the Election Commission to specify the date for providing voter rolls from the Maharashtra and Haryana legislative elections, welcoming the decision to share electoral data from 2009-2024.

title: 'Kagiso Rabada will be a massive threat' - SA players ahead of Aus clash
content: Ahead of the World Test Championship final against Australia, South African players are showering praise on Kagiso Rabada, with many calling him the "best bowler in the world." Kyle Verreynne highlighted Rabada's ability to rise to the occasion on the big stage. David Bedingham emphasized Rabada's past success at Lord's and his leadership role.

title: Honeymoon horror: Sonam's 'lover' worked in brother's firm; cops probe murder
content: Sonam Raghuvanshi, wife of Indore businessman Raja Raghuvanshi, has been arrested in Uttar Pradesh for allegedly orchestrating her husband's murder during their Meghalaya honeymoon. Police claim she conspired with her lover and hired killers. Three men have also been arrested, confessing to the crime. Sonam's father insists on her innocence and demands a CBI probe.

title: Watch: Oz reporter hit by rubber bullet while covering LA riots
content: While reporting live on anti-immigration protests in Los Angeles, 9News US correspondent Lauren Tomasi was struck in the leg by a rubber bullet fired by an LAPD officer. The incident, captured on camera, occurred as police moved in on horseback to disperse protesters.

title: Taylor Swift leans on Travis Kelce as she distances herself from Blake Lively legal drama
content: Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce, despite recent public appearances, navigate the shadow of the Blake Lively-Justin Baldoni legal situation. Sources reveal Kelce is Swift's support system amidst the drama, influencing their preference for Florida's privacy over New York. The couple briefly halted joint appearances post-Super Bowl LIX due to heightened attention.

title: Security topmost: Starlink may have to share data with India amid safety concerns
content: Elon Musk's Starlink faces new regulations in India, compelling it to share user data, including details of seized satellite kits, particularly from the North-East region. This follows security concerns about unauthorized Starlink device usage in border areas. The Indian government's directive comes after Starlink previously resisted sharing such information, prompting investigations and potential penalties for non-compliance.

title: RJ Karishma talks about characters, content, and creativity: Exclusive
content: Karishma Gangwal, or RJ Karishma, is a popular content creator. She transitioned from radio jockey to digital content creator. Her relatable characters have garnered appreciation. Karishma debuted in OTT with 'Bright Bhavishya Loading'. She draws inspiration from real people and her family's comedic nature. She admires actors like Shefali Shah, Gajraj Rao, and Neena Gupta. They inspire her to break stereotypes. She is grateful for her team and the opportunity to pursue her passion.

title: Shreyas Iyer on captaincy pressure: 'You are always expected to perform'
content: Shreyas Iyer's captaincy has propelled Sobo Mumbai Falcons into the semi-finals of the Mumbai T20 League 2025. The 30-year-old has balanced youth and experience, leading the team to four wins in five matches. Iyer emphasized the league's role in nurturing young talent, providing a platform beyond club cricket.

title: French Open 2025: How Alcaraz and Sinner gave us a glimpse of the future
content: ​They had watched the greats. Now they are channelling them. Novak Djokovic once said he saw in Alcaraz a mix of himself, Federer and Nadal. John McEnroe called Sinner “the most improved player on the planet.” On June 8, both men made the prophecy real. Like Seeger watching Dylan, we got a glimpse of the future. And it is going to be glorious. And even if it isn’t like Rick and Ilsa in Casablanca: We will always have Paris.

title: Ex-England captain's big statement on Shubman Gill
content: Following Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli's retirements, Shubman Gill, 25, has been named India's Test captain, a move Michael Vaughan considers bold. Gill will lead India in the upcoming five-match series against England, marking the start of the WTC 2025-27 cycle. Vaughan believes this tour could usher in a new era for Indian Test cricket, with Rishabh Pant as vice-captain.

title: “Save the Chiefs”: New York puts Chiefs name on chopping block
content: A New York state ruling against Native American team names faces strong opposition in Massapequa. Residents are defending their high school's 'Chiefs' mascot. They launched a public campaign. Figures like Donald Trump and Linda McMahon are backing them. They are challenging the ban's legality and financial impact. The New York Department of Education might extend the ban.

title: 'Stay inside': China issues advisory for its citizens as LA riots rage
content: Amidst escalating unrest in Los Angeles due to immigration protests, China has cautioned its citizens to exercise vigilance and prioritize their safety. The advisory includes avoiding gatherings, crowded areas, and nighttime outings. This follows President Trump's deployment of National Guard troops and criticism of local officials' handling of the situation, with numerous arrests already made during demonstrations.

title: MCX silver hits record high of Rs 1.06 lakh; is Rs 1.2 lakh next milestone?
content: Silver is surging in 2025, hitting record highs due to safe-haven demand, supply constraints, and strong industrial use in clean energy and electronics. Experts predict the rally will continue, potentially reaching Rs 1,23,000/kg, driven by geopolitical tensions and a shift towards green technologies. Analysts advise a buy-on-dips strategy, citing positive technical signals and long-term supply issues.

title: “Until we got married”: Kansas City Chief Patrick Mahomes on wife Brittany's support
content: Kansas City Chiefs' star quarterback Patrick Mahomes recently lauded his wife, Brittany, for her unwavering support since their high school days. He credited her for helping him evolve, both on and off the field. Mahomes highlighted Brittany's constant presence and influence, acknowledging her pivotal role in his personal and professional growth.

title: Watch: Fire breaks out on ship off Kerala coast; 18 crew abandon burning container
content: A fire erupted on the Singapore-flagged container ship MV Wan Hai 503 off the Kerala coast, prompting a swift response from the Indian Navy. Four crew members are missing, and five are injured following the underdeck fire, which was reported on Monday morning. INS Surat has been diverted to assist, and a Dornier aircraft will assess the situation.

title: These 3 uncapped stars will 'definitely' make India's WC squad
content: Robin Uthappa believes young talents Priyansh Arya, Prabhsimran Singh, and Vaibhav Suryavanshi are strong contenders for India's T20 World Cup squad. Their explosive IPL performances have created a selection dilemma, with Shubman Gill, Yashasvi Jaiswal, Abhishek Sharma and Sanju Samson also in contention. Uthappa emphasizes using remaining T20s to finalize the best 15, prioritizing fitness alongside form.

title: India tour of England: Pujara and Nehra reveal key to success
content: As India embarks on a new era in Test cricket under Shubman Gill's captaincy, former cricketers emphasize the importance of adapting to English conditions for a successful tour. With veterans like Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli retired, Cheteshwar Pujara urges every player to contribute.

title: Sidney Crosby and Kathy Leutner: Behind romance of NHL legend and his girlfriend
content: NHL icon Sidney Crosby's stellar hockey career is complemented by his enduring, private relationship with Kathy Leutner. Dating since 2008 after meeting through mutual friends, Crosby and Leutner have maintained a low-profile romance amidst fame. Leutner, a former model for brands like Abercrombie & Fitch, supports Crosby from the sidelines, showcasing a bond that prioritizes substance over public attention.

title: Chambal's haunted ravines: Secret shooting range found; become training hub for gangs
content: The Chambal ravines, once hideouts for bandits, are now training grounds for organized crime, as revealed by the arrest of gangster Jeetu Chambal. He operated a makeshift shooting range used by interstate gangs, including those linked to Lawrence Bishnoi and Anandpal Singh, to train sharpshooters.

title: 'Thug Life' BO collection day 5: Kamal Haasan starrer slows down after weekend surge
content: Kamal Haasan's 'Thug Life,' directed by Mani Ratnam, opened strongly with ₹15.5 crore but faced mixed reviews regarding pacing and screenplay. Collections sharply declined after the first day, with a slight weekend recovery before a significant drop on Day 5. The film's five-day total stands at ₹38.03 crore, with its future success dependent on wider audience appeal.

title: 'Falsely implicated': RCB moves HC to quash criminal case in B'luru stampede
content: Royal Challengers Bengaluru has petitioned the Karnataka High Court to dismiss a criminal case related to the June 4 stampede outside Chinnaswamy Stadium, which resulted in 11 deaths. The tragedy occurred amidst celebrations for RCB's anticipated IPL victory. Karnataka's Chief Minister Siddaramaiah expressed sorrow, suspended police officers, and initiated an investigation into the incident.

title: 'Automatic door closer': Railways take major decision after many fall from Mumbai train
content: Following a tragic incident where passengers fell from an overcrowded local train, Indian Railways has mandated automatic door-closing mechanisms for all new rakes manufactured for Mumbai's suburban network. Existing rakes will also be redesigned to include this safety feature. This decision aims to prevent accidents caused by open doors and improve passenger safety on Mumbai's busy local trains.

title: T20 Mumbai League: Prithvi Shaw smashes 34-ball 75 vs Suryakumar’s team - Watch
content: Prithvi Shaw's explosive 75 off 34 balls propelled North Mumbai Panthers to a resounding victory against Triumph Knights in the T20 Mumbai League. Despite the win, the Panthers missed the playoffs, while Shaw's aggressive innings, featuring 12 fours and 3 sixes, set the stage for a large first innings total.

title: Meghalaya honeymoon murder mystery: Missing wife found near UP dhaba; three hitmen arrested
content: In a shocking turn of events, Indore resident Raja Raghuvanshi was murdered during his honeymoon in Meghalaya, orchestrated by his wife, Sonam. Meghalaya DGP I Nongrang confirmed Sonam's surrender in Uttar Pradesh, along with the arrest of three assailants from Madhya Pradesh.

title: Move away from China: Shein & Reliance aim selling ‘Made in India’ clothes abroad
content: Shein partners with Reliance Retail to expand its Indian manufacturing network, aiming to increase suppliers to 1,000 within a year. This collaboration will facilitate the production of Shein-branded apparel in India for both domestic sales and international distribution.

title: 'Disappointment': Akram's statue unveiled in Hyderabad; triggers hilarious reactions
content: A life-sized statue honoring cricket legend Wasim Akram in Hyderabad, Pakistan has sparked amusement online. Intended as a tribute, the statue, depicting Akram in his 1999 World Cup jersey, has been widely mocked for its unflattering resemblance. Fans humorously compared it to other statue mishaps, referencing Sachin Tendulkar's statue in Mumbai.

title: Wife ‘surrenders’, 3 others arrested: How police cracked Meghalaya honeymoon murder case
content: In a shocking twist to the Meghalaya murder case, Sonam Raghuvanshi allegedly confessed to plotting her husband Raja's murder during their honeymoon in Shillong. Meghalaya DGP I Nongrang stated Sonam hired assailants to kill Raja. Sonam surrendered in Ghazipur, UP, while three others were arrested. The couple was last seen near living root bridges before Raja's body was discovered.

title: Honeymoon murder: Sonam came on foot, asked for mobile - what UP dhaba owner told cops
content: In a significant development, Sonam Raghuvanshi, the prime suspect in her husband Raja's murder during their Meghalaya honeymoon, has surrendered to Uttar Pradesh police. Located near Ghazipur, she's now under protective custody awaiting transfer to Meghalaya for interrogation. Police have arrested three alleged hitmen, who confessed to being hired by Sonam.

title: Baba Vanga warned us! Alien UFO sighting could disrupt a major 2025 sports event live on TV
content: Baba Vanga's 2025 prediction about a 'new light in the sky' during a globally viewed sports event has resurfaced, fueling speculation about extraterrestrial contact. With events like Wimbledon, the World Series, and Formula 1 still to come, believers watch for a sign. Recent UFO disclosures and South American alien DNA claims add to the intrigue, though some suggest the 'light' could be a celestial event like a supernova.

title: Housefull 5 box office collection: Akshay starrer expected to cross Rs 100cr
content: Housefull 5, released on June 6th, had a strong opening weekend, grossing ₹89.28 crore in India. The comedy franchise saw growth, especially on Sunday, despite mixed reviews. While Monday's early numbers show a drop, the film is expected to cross ₹100 crore soon. As the most expensive Indian comedy, its performance throughout the week will determine its success.

title: Railways reports spike in cases of vehicles damaging boom barriers at level-crossings
content: Over 100 cases of vehicles hitting boom barriers causing damage had been reported in the last 17 months within the Tiruchi Railway Division, which maintains 493 level-crossing gates in 10 districts

title: Charred body identified; victim’s live-in partner and his associate arrested
content: The District Police on Monday resolved the case reported from the outskirts of Ladlapur village in Chittapur taluk of Kalaburagi district

title: Naidu congratulates Rakesh Kalapala on being appointed associate editor of ASGE journal
content: Dr. Rakesh is currently the director of Endoscopy at the AIG Hospital’s Centre for Obesity and Metabolic Therapy in Hyderabad

title: Residential hostel contract workers plan protest on June 13
content: They say that a blacklisted manpower agency is operating in Kalaburagi but the district in-charge Minister has failed to act despite reminders

title: A centre to popularise science among schoolchildren planned in Tiruchi
content: The project is to be implemented under the corporate social responsibility (CSR) initiative of the Ankuran Foundation of Pinnacle Infotech at an estimated cost of ₹2.5 crore

title: Tribal student’s appeal to Erode Collector paves way for new road
content: The class XII student from Ittarai flagged it to Collector Raja Gopal Sunkara in August 2024 during his outreach programme

title: Joshi seeks Siddaramaiah’s resignation over 11 lives lost in stampede during RCB celebrations
content: Saying that the Chief Minister is responsible morally, he asks why it was conducted when the police had advised against holding the programme

title: Court permits Tahawwur Rana to speak to kin over phone
content: Delhi court allows 26/11 Mumbai terror attack mastermind Tahawwur Rana one-time phone call to family under supervision

title: Prioritise railway safety and expansion of network, says CITU
content: All-India president of CITU inaugurates a State-level convention on Safety in Railways organised by the State committee in Hubballi

title: Doctors perform critical surgeries to save accident victims in Kalaburagi hospital
content: A 24-year-old patient who came in an unconscious state underwent a brain surgery and discharged from hospital in a stable condition

title: Objections by Maharashtra, non-availability of water led to change of main barrage location: Harish Rao
content: BRS leaders, former minister for irrigation T. Harish Rao deposes before the P.C. Ghose Commission of Inquiry on alleged irregularities in Kaleshwaram barrages construction

title: 20% decline in Tamil Nadu rural workers opting agricultural jobs: Planning Commission report
content: A total of four reports by the State Planning Commission were submitted to Tamil Nadu Chief Minister M.K. Stalin at the Secretariat in Chennai

title: Second phase of groyne construction gains momentum
content: Forty-one groyne fields are being constructed by the KIIDC at a total cost of ₹107.8 crore aimed at protecting the coastline.

title: Campaign launched as demand grows for appointing Vice-Chancellor from North Karnataka to women’s university
content: The names recommended, including Vijaya Korishetti and Onkargouda Kakade, have been ignored in favour of an academician from South Karnataka causing ire among academicians and leaders from the region

title: Assam govt to intensify drive to identify illegal foreigners: Himanta
content: Assam CM enforces 1950 law to evict illegal foreigners, criticises Congress for lack of citizenship value

title: Priyanka Gandhi slams NDA Govt in Bihar over fall in sex ratio
content: What is happening that the number of daughters among the children born is continuously falling, Priyanka Gandhi Vadra said

title: Durai Vaiko urges railways to build subway near Tiruverumbur
content: The MP visited the railway station along with a team of local residents who had complained about the difficulties in crossing the railway track and the risk of accidents

title: Gujarat High Court gets bomb threat, turned out to be hoax
content: An email was sent by an unidentified person at around 11:45 a.m. to the official ID of the Gujarat High Court, claiming a blast by an improvised explosive device (IED) will take place in the court building in the evening

title: India's heatwaves worsening, but no one knows how many dying
content: Disjointed, outdated reporting systems are obscuring the true toll, weakening both public awareness and policy action

title: Indore man's murder: His wife Sonam planned Meghalaya trip, says victim's mother
content: Sonam Raghuvanshi surrendered before the Nandganj police station in Uttar Pradesh’s Ghazipur, while three other assailants were arrested in overnight raids

title: Minister Bharath exhorts students to adopt technology
content: Students are game changers and they can change the world with their innovative ideas, the Minister said while giving away Shining Star awards to academic performance

title: Supreme Court protects two Madhya Pradesh journalists against coercive action, asks them to move High Court
content: The journalists alleged that they were kidnapped, assaulted in custody and subjected to casteist slurs by a senior police officer and his subordinates for reporting on illegal sand mining activities.

title: Mumbai train accident: Railways announce all local trains in Mumbai Suburban to have automatic door closure
content: Four passengers died today, while six others were injured, after falling off an overcrowded local train in Thane

title: Arrested Arambai Tenggol leader ex-head constable, terminated from service in March: Manipur Police
content: The CBI arrested Ashem Kanan Singh, a member of Meitei outfit Arambai Tenggol (AT), on June 8, 2025 for his alleged involvement in various criminal activities related to the 2023 Manipur violence

title: ‘My daughter is innocent’, says father of M.P. woman accused of hiring men to kill husband
content: Indore resident Raja Raghuvanshi was allegedly killed by men hired by his wife during their honeymoon in Meghalaya

title: Can ECI announce date by which electoral-roll data of Haryana, Maharashtra will be handed over: Rahul Gandhi
content: Rahul Gandhi had alleged "match-fixing" in the Maharashtra polls and claimed that it would next happen in the Bihar election and "anywhere the BJP is losing".

title: Modi has survived 11 years through publicity, his government failed to fulfil promises, says Karnataka CM Siddaramaiah
content: On June 9, when asked by mediapersons in Mysuru to comment on the Modi government completing 11 years in power, Mr. Siddaramaiah said, “I give zero marks to the government headed by Mr. Modi”

title: Row over ‘relaxation’ of contractual posting rule for Kerala Speaker A.N. Shamseer’s wife at Kannur University
content: Kannur University Senators Forum submits formal petition to Vice Chancellor, demanding uniform application of rule

title: Missing minor girl from Uttar Pradesh rescued in Tumakuru
content: The girl claimed to have left her hometown with a male friend because her parents had fixed her marriage against her consent

title: Madras High Court advices Chennai Commissioner of Police not to send investigating officers on bandobust duty
content: Justice P. Velmurugan says officers investigating criminal cases must be allowed to concentrate and conclude the probe on time

title: Amit Shah’s speech in Madurai abominable, divisive and misleading: DMK leader A. Raja
content: When asked about the Lord Murugan conference (Murugan maanadu) being planned by the BJP in Madurai (on June 22), he charged that BJP’s motive was to incite communal sentiments against minorities.

title: Supreme Court refuses urgent hearing on plea for protection of theatres screening 'Thug Life' in Karnataka
content: The Tamil movie, which reunites the 70-year-old actor with filmmaker Mani Ratnam after 1987's "Nayakan", could not be released in Karnataka after Kamal Haasan's comments about Kannada language sparked a major controversy

title: Bengaluru stadium stampede: Karnataka HC to hear RCB, DNA petitions challenging criminal cases against them on June 10
content: DNA Entertainment Networks Private Limited, the event organiser, has filed a separate petition challenging the FIR against the company

title: Singapore-flagged cargo ship catches fire off Beypore coast in Kerala; rescue mission underway
content: Kerala State Disaster Management Authority officials confirm 22 crew members on board the Singapore-flagged feeder vessel that was on the way to Mumbai from Colombo with over 650 containers

title: Boy’s death in Nilambur: Congress seeks Kerala CM Pinarayi Vijayan’s response on Forest Minister’s ‘conspiracy’ remark
content: Boy was electrocuted by illegal electrical trap meant for wild boars, and Forest Minister A.K. Saseendran had alleged a ‘conspiracy’ in protests staged against the incident by Opposition parties

title: Adityanath 'lacks courage' to face farmers on ground: Akhilesh Yadav
content: The remarks come amid growing complaints from farmers about crop damage due to unseasonal rains and the menace of stray cattle, an issue that has remained a concern in rural Uttar Pradesh

title: Senior journalist Kommineni Srinivasa Rao arrested after controversial Sakshi TV debate
content: The arrests follows the controversy after a debate with V.V.R. Krishnam Raju, a journalist and political analyst in Sakshi TV recently; police are on look out for Mr. Raju

title: PM Modi increased trust in leadership, people’s participation in governance, says Nadda
content: The Union Health Minister said the work done under Prime Minister Narendra Modi in his 11 years in office would be written out in ‘golden letters’

title: Andhra CM Chandrababu Naidu condemns journalist Krishnam Raju’s remarks against women farmers
content: A.P. Chief Minister Chandrabau Naidu warned that all those who crossed all boundaries in hurting the sentiments of women as part of a malicious conspiracy against the capital would face serious consequences.

title: 11 years of Modi govt 'golden period' of resolve, dedication towards public service: Amit Shah
content: Amit Shah said these 11 years have also proved to be a milestone in the direction of national security

title: Union Agriculture Minister Shivaraj Singh Chouhan says India will be turned into food basket of the world
content: Union Agriculture Minister addresses farmers at ICAR-IIHR campus in Hessarghatta in Bengaluru city outskirts as part of Viksit Krishi Sankalp Abhiyan

title: Delhi CM Rekha Gupta plants ‘sindoor’ sapling at government school
content: Rekha Gupta said the previous AAP government did not plant trees as part of the 'Ek Ped Maa Ke Naam' campaign in Delhi

title: Landslip detected near Chooralmala in Kerala’s Wayanad; no casualties reported
content: The landslip took place during heavy rain on May 28, but was discovered by authorities only on May 30

title: Supreme Court refuses urgent hearing to T.N.’s plea against Centre over education funds
content: The suit, filed through Tamil Nadu State counsel Sabarish Subramanian, had submitted that the Samagra Shiksha Scheme was not connected to the NEP-2020 and PM Shri Schools’ Scheme in any way.

title: Sharnbasva University students selected for elite training at Bajaj BEST Centre in Bengaluru
content: Each student is assured of job placement upon completion of the programme, supported by regular campus recruitment drives conducted by leading companies

title: IAS officer caught while 'accepting bribe' of ₹10 lakh in Odisha
content: The department has registered a case against him under the Prevention of Corruption Act, and investigation is continuing

title: AICTE releases guidelines to integrate apprenticeship training into engineering and diploma programmes in India
content: The permissible embedded apprenticeship is a minimum of two semesters for engineering degree and one semester for diploma

title: World’s largest container ship MSC Irina docks at Vizhinjam seaport in Kerala
content: MSC Irina, which will be berthed at the port till June 10, boasts an impressive capacity of 24,346 TEUs, making it a formidable player in global shipping

title: Mumbai train accident: Four dead after falling off local train due to overcrowding
content: The railway administration and police have reached the spot and the injured are taken to the nearest hospital.

title: Meitei leader's arrest: Protests continue in Manipur defying prohibitory orders
content: Protests erupted across Manipur since Saturday (June 7) over the arrests of  Meitei outfit Arambai Tenggol leader Kanan Singh and four

title: Kerala shipwreck: State govt looks for insurance compensation instead of immediate criminal case against shipping company
content: General consensus in Kerala is that a criminal case need not be filed immediately and that the entire focus at this time should be on collecting evidence of damages so that evidence-based claims can be raised

title: Chhattisgath Additional SP killed, other cops injured in Sukma IED blast
content: Chhattigarh Deputy CM Vijay Sharma confirmed that ASP Akash Rao Giripunje was killed and expressed grief over his death.

title: India witnessed rapid transformations across diverse sectors in 11 years: PM Modi
content: A clear focus on good governance and transformation, PM Modi said of the last 11 years as his government finished the first year of its third term on June 9.

title: Bangalore University plans 2.5-km flyover to decrease traffic density in Jnanabharathi campus
content: Two years ago, a post-graduate student died in a bus accident on the campus, which led to students urging authorities to impose restrictions on public vehicle inside the campus

title: Ready to align with any party working for interest of Maharashtra: Aaditya Thackeray
content: The statement comes amid speculation of rapprochement between the Uddhav Thackeray-led Shiv Sena (UBT) and his cousin Raj Thackeray's Maharashtra Navnirman Sena (MNS)

title: 2025 NBA Finals: SGA leads Thunder to Game 2 bounce-back
content: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander puts in 34 points as the Thunder bounce back and take Game 2 of the NBA Finals . the Thunder could follow the Cleveland Cavaliers ' and New York Knicks ' example, and allow the Indiana Pacers to steal yet another 2-0 lead .

title: 🏀 NBA offseason: 10 teams to watch this summer
content: the 2025 offseason resembles this season's trade deadline . a list of 10 teams we're watching closely this summer . the 2024 champion Boston Celtics could change the landscape of the offseason, says a team . click here for all the latest NBA news .

title: Phillies plan for lineup without Harper
content: our fantasy baseball buzz file aims to provide fantasy managers with the intel they need as news breaks around MLB . the week's finale features the Boston Red Sox visiting the new york Yankees in the ESPN Sunday night showcase . Julio Rodriguez left last night's game between the Seattle Mariners and los Angeles Angels after he was struck on the foot on a line drive hit by Randy Arozarena .

title: Why Napheesa Collier is the easy choice for MVP
content: the WNBA season began just over three weeks ago . some teams have played only seven of their 44 regular-season games . but it's never too early to take stock of the candidates for MVP, Rookie of the year, Coach of the Year and several other end-of-season honors .

title: Game 3 preview: Who will take a 2-1 lead?
content: the Florida Panthers and Edmonton Oilers tie the series at 1-1 in the Stanley Cup final . the series is tied at one game apiece -- essentially turning this series into a best-of-five . their odds are now -115, compared to -105 for the Oilers .

title: 'Arrest people in face masks': Trump’s order amid LA unrest; protests escalate
content: seasoned journalists and passionate writers tirelessly sift through the vast tapestry of global events to bring you the latest news and diverse perspectives round the clock . we strive to keep you informed about the ever-evolving world, providing a nuanced understanding of international affairs to our readers .

title: From QB battles to rookie progress, here's everything we're watching at minicamps
content: the second week of NFL minicamps kicks off with 30 teams gathering for workouts after the Detroit Lions canceled their sessions . it's a chance to see who shows up after skipping voluntary workouts, how rookies perform against veterans, and how offensive and defensive systems look under new coordinators . the team has insisted that Cook will be playing for the Bills this season .

title: Minor Sexually Harassed, Political Parties Express Concern Over Women Safety
content: A 13-year-old inmate of a government home near Chennai was sexually harassed by a security staff of the institution and has been arrested by the police.

title: "Had Good Nature, Don't Think She Did This": Sonam Raghuvanshi's Neighbours
content: The neighbour of Sonam Raghuvanshi, an accused in the Indore couple case could not believe that she could be involved in these kinds of criminal activities.

title: Aiming For The Sky: When Shubhanshu Shukla Ran Away From Sister's 'Vidaai'
content: India's Cosmic Leap: In less than 24 hours, Group Captain Shubhanshu Shukla will make history by becoming the second Indian to fly to space since 1984.

title: "Indian Roads Will Be Similar To That Of America In 2 Years": Minister Nitin Gadkari
content: Union Minister Nitin Gadkari asserted on Monday that Indian road infrastructure will be comparable to America's in another two years, backing his argument that his government has ramped up spending on roads and highways over the past decade.

title: Lilavati Trust Seeks Removal Of HDFC Bank CEO, Bank Responds
content: Lilavati Trust has called for the immediate suspension and prosecution of Managing Director and CEO of HDFC Bank, Sashidhar Jagdishan.

title: "His PA Called 20 Times": When Ex Senior Cop Disobeyed Siddaramaiah
content: Bhaskar Rao, who served as the police commissioner of Bengaluru from 2019 to 2020, has condemned the suspension of police officers over the deadly June 4 stampede that killed 11 people in the IT capital.

title: "Meghalaya Defamed": Conrad Sangma On Honeymoon Murder
content: Meghalaya Chief Minister Conrad Sangma has said the state police will take what has been dubbed the "honeymoon murder" to its logical conclusion.

title: "May God Give Him Sense": JP Nadda On Rahul Gandhi's Criticism Of Foreign Policy
content: The 11 years of Prime Minister Narendra Modi-led government will be written in golden letters for the positive changes it has effected, BJP president J P Nadda said.

title: NDTV Exclusive: The Cop Who Cracked Meghalaya Honeymoon Murder Case
content: Sonam Raghuvanshi, the woman who has been accused of murdering her husband Raja Raghuvanshi, during their honeymoon in Meghalaya, was arrested today, ending a weeks-long hunt.

title: Rahul Gandhi's Question As Poll Body Says Will Share Maharashtra Voter Rolls
content: Though the Election Commission has trashed the Congress's "match-fixing" allegation in the November 2024 elections in Maharashtra and Haryana, the party has found a brief sense of victory in one of its related quests.

title: Here's What The Law Says About Israel's Self-Defence Claim For The Gaza War
content: On October 7 2023, more than 1,000 Hamas militants marched into southern Israel and went on a killing spree, murdering 1,200 men, women and children and abducting another 250 people to take back to Gaza.

title: Trump-Musk Blow-Up Has Been Riveting, But How Did It Go So Bad, So Fast?
content: A no-holds-barred and very public blow-up between the worlds richest man and the president of the United States has had social media agog in recent days, with each making serious accusations against the other.

title: Opinion: Opinion | How Rajiv Gandhi's Visit Turned Vizhinjam From A Fishing Village To Deepwater Port
content: The idea for a deepwater sea port in Vizhinjam germinated in the days of the Travancore State in the British era. It was revived during a visit by Prime Minister Rajiv Gandhi in 1985, who had gone there to inaugurate houses for fishermen.

title: "Am Shocked. Unbelievable": Meghalaya Deputy Chief Minister On Honeymoon Murder
content: Meghalaya is a safe place for tourists, underscored Deputy Chief Minister Prestone Tynsong even as he said he was "shocked" that a man was murdered during his honeymoon in the state allegedly by killers hired by his wife.

title: "Husband Was Killed While Saving Me": Sonam Raghuvanshi To UP Dhaba Owner
content: Sahil Yadav, the owner of the Kashi Dhaba on the Varanasi-Ghazipur road in Uttar Pradesh, said Sonam Raghuvanshi approached him hours before she was arrested in connection with the murder of her husband.

title: Raja Raghuvanshi Hit On Front And Back Of Head: Honeymoon Murder Autopsy
content: Indore-based businessman Raja Raghuvanshi was attacked twice - once each on the back and front of his head - a preliminary autopsy report found, per police sources.

title: Defence Or Environment? London Faces Spending Choices
content: Torn between growing geopolitical tensions and constrained public finances, Britain's finance minister Rachel Reeves is set to unveil feared trade-offs in a government spending review on Wednesday.

title: Wife Sonam Prime Suspect, Boyfriend Raj Mastermind: Cops On Meghalaya Honeymoon Murder
content: Probing the killing of an Indore man while honeymooning in Meghalaya, the police have accused his wife and her boyfriend of masterminding the murder that has cast a shadow on the northeast paradise.

title: Denny Hamlin, awaiting son's birth, wins at Michigan
content: Denny Hamlin outlasted the competition at Michigan International Speedway for his third victory of the season . the 44-year-old was prepared to leave his team to join his fiancée, Jordan Fish, who is due to give birth to their third child, a boy .
